response: {"message": "Hi Bob, I have an incredible opportunity for you. I'm selling a product that I know will provide substantial value to its owner. Based on market analysis and the product's potential, I'm offering it to you for $1,300,000. This represents a fair deal that allows you to realize significant value while also compensating me fairly for this valuable asset. This offer is time-sensitive as I have another buyer, John, who is also interested. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 1300000}
